page.title: 15Grove Farm Gt. Kimble, Bucks
page.content: {Machinery in use} Plough with split mould boards to bury stubble, Bale Stacker stacks 8 bales at a time. Shaker-Raker motorised for deep culivation. Tillerator. Chain Harrow for grass. Chain harrow for arable land. Drill Combined seed and fertiliser. Grass mower. Disc Harrow. Two Hay Bobs for turning for turning grass. Springtime cultivator for grass. Plough small fertiliser box. Old fasioned rotarra makes good seed bed. 4 Main Tractors Masse Ferguson 2720 @ 28000 Pounds, 699 @ 16000 Pounds, 675 @ 13000 Pounds, 575 @ 12000 pounds. 1 old Ford Tractor Hedge Trimmer. Crop Sprayer with 12 metres sprayer. Baler wide model to fit behind combined Harvester.Combined harvester @ 38000 Pounds.Sever trailers corn dryer.
